mapper.sql: COURIER_NUMBER, SEND_TIME, CTM_NAME, CTM_BAR_CODE, PROVINCE, ADDRESS, DELIVERY_STATE, SIGNATORY, ADDRESSEE, SIGN_TIME, ABNORMAL_CAUSE, IS_TIME_OUT, ORDER_NUMBER, SHOP_NUMBER, PHONE, WEIGHT, COURIER_COMPANY, GOODS, GOODS_COST, FEE, CREATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from SOURCE_THIRD_PARTY
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into SOURCE_THIRD_PARTY (COURIER_NUMBER, SEND_TIME, CTM_NAME, CTM_BAR_CODE, PROVINCE, ADDRESS, DELIVERY_STATE, SIGNATORY, ADDRESSEE, SIGN_TIME, ABNORMAL_CAUSE, IS_TIME_OUT, ORDER_NUMBER, SHOP_NUMBER, PHONE, WEIGHT, COURIER_COMPANY, GOODS, GOODS_COST, FEE, CREATE_TIME ) values (#{courierNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctmBarCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signatory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{abnormalCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isTimeOut,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shopNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{courierCompany,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

COURIER_NUMBER,

mapper.update:
update SOURCE_THIRD_PARTY
COURIER_NUMBER = #{record.courierNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SEND_TIME = #{record.sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CTM_NAME = #{record.ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTM_BAR_CODE = #{record.ctmBarCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROVINCE = #{record.province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELIVERY_STATE = #{record.deliveryState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIGNATORY = #{record.signatory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESSEE = #{record.addressee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIGN_TIME = #{record.signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ABNORMAL_CAUSE = #{record.abnormalCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_TIME_OUT = #{record.isTimeOut,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORDER_NUMBER = #{record.orderNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SHOP_NUMBER = #{record.shopNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEIGHT = #{record.weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COURIER_COMPANY = #{record.courierCompany,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GOODS = #{record.goods,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_COST = #{record.goodsCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FEE = #{record.fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update SOURCE_THIRD_PARTY set COURIER_NUMBER = #{record.courierNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SEND_TIME = #{record.sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CTM_NAME = #{record.ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTM_BAR_CODE = #{record.ctmBarCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROVINCE = #{record.province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELIVERY_STATE = #{record.deliveryState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGNATORY = #{record.signatory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESSEE = #{record.addressee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGN_TIME = #{record.signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ABNORMAL_CAUSE = #{record.abnormalCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_TIME_OUT = #{record.isTimeOut,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORDER_NUMBER = #{record.orderNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SHOP_NUMBER = #{record.shopNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIGHT = #{record.weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COURIER_COMPANY = #{record.courierCompany,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GOODS = #{record.goods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_COST = #{record.goodsCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FEE = #{record.fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update SOURCE_THIRD_PARTY
SEND_TIME = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CTM_NAME = #{ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTM_BAR_CODE = #{ctmBarCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELIVERY_STATE = #{deliveryState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIGNATORY = #{signatory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SHOP_NUMBER = #{shopNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where COURIER_NUMBER = #{courierNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SOURCE_THIRD_PARTY set SEND_TIME = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CTM_NAME = #{ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTM_BAR_CODE = #{ctmBarCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELIVERY_STATE = #{deliveryState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGNATORY = #{signatory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESSEE = #{addressee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGN_TIME = #{signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ABNORMAL_CAUSE = #{abnormalCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_TIME_OUT = #{isTimeOut,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORDER_NUMBER = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SHOP_NUMBER = #{shopNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COURIER_COMPANY = #{courierCompany,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GOODS = #{goods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_COST = #{goodsCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FEE = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where COURIER_NUMBER = #{courierNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
